channel.title: How to modify the stats of a item
channel.description: i want to make a item that gives really high stats for owners only how would i do that

item.title: How to modify the stats of a item
item.dc:creator: @Defiance Defiance
item.description:
@Defiance wrote:

In -Item.cfg- You Will See Something Like:

item = 773	'perfect'_ring	A_perfect_ruby_ring.		1	1	1	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000

Those numbers. Are the stats. Just edit those numbers on the item you want. It will make it stronger.

Read full topic
item.source: How to modify the stats of a item
